rows.name: text
rows.value:
Hi @fields.user_name! You are starting your second month of using @global.parent_app. Amazing! 

Almost every family struggles with money issues, therefore, this week’s @global.workshop will give you a tool that will help you to plan your expenses so you can have enough money to get through the month.
